backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global resets.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point loading main.tsx with PWA manifest and favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and installable icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router layout handling header, footer tabs, and route visibility rules.
Breathing circle UI with phase-based colors, animations, and optional progress ring.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Renders a simple SVG line chart of breath-hold durations over time.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Bar chart showing daily minutes practiced, scaled to the week's max.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing custom breathing pattern timings with numeric inputs.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable exercise card with icon, description, and an isolated info button.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Card component for a breathing exercise with start action, info button, and optional duration editing dialog.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: SVG progress ring split into segments, filling segments based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Table displaying past exercise sessions with formatted date and duration.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Vertical slider UI for adjusting a numeric volume value with optional icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Breathing cycle state machine with timers, voice cues, haptics, and pause/resume control.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibrate function using the browser haptics API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Manages per-exercise duration settings with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook that acquires and releases a screen wake lock based on an active flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and breathing animations.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controller for looping rain and wave audio with volume control and exclusive playback.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines breathing pattern types, presets, and a helper to compute total cycle length.
frontend/src/lib/exerciseInfoContent.ts: Static content describing breathing exercises, their benefits, and methods.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Utility functions to read and write breath-hold records, sessions, and durations in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and provides logic to prevent premature auto-stop.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Type definitions for stored breath-hold records and breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Transforms session data into daily minutes, breath-hold chart data, and recent sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Constant keys used for localStorage storage of session data.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Controls speech synthesis for voice guidance with volume, queued speech, and async speech.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, global styles, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying app info, premium teaser, and quick settings with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Provides a form for creating a custom breathing pattern and navigates to the player with the configured settings.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseInfo.tsx: Displays detailed info about a selected exercise and lets users start it with the mapped breathing pattern and theme color.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows preset breathing exercise cards, handles starting exercises, adjusting durations, and navigating to info or test pages.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session with timing, audio, voice guidance, and autosave logic based on pattern, color, and duration from URL params.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders configurable app settings including audio, haptics, and notifications with simple toggles.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Loads and displays historical breathing and breath-hold data using charts and a recent sessions table.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: React page that runs a breath-hold timer, tracks elapsed time, saves attempts to localStorage, and displays the all‑time record.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable PWA functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending fonts, colors, screens, and radius, and enabling animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s features, versions, and high-level capabilities for build/state tracking.
